tea.instructions: Boil water, add tea leaves, add milk & sugar, and enjoy your tea!

pasta.instructions: Boil pasta, sauté garlic, add tomato sauce, mix, and top with cheese!

omelette.instructions: Beat eggs, heat butter in a pan, pour eggs, cook for 2 minutes, add cheese, fold and serve!

fried rice.instructions: Stir-fry garlic, add vegetables, add cooked rice, pour soy sauce, mix well!

burger.instructions: Grill patty, toast bun, assemble with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and mayo!

smoothie.instructions: Blend all ingredients together until smooth, serve chilled!

pizza.instructions: Spread sauce over dough, add cheese and toppings, bake at 220°C for 15 minutes.

biryani.instructions: Cook rice, marinate meat with spices, layer and slow cook until aromatic.

dal tadka.instructions: Cook lentils, prepare tempering with ghee and spices, mix and serve.

samosa.instructions: Prepare dough, fill with spiced potato mixture, deep fry till golden.

paneer butter masala.instructions: Cook tomatoes with spices, blend into a creamy sauce, add paneer and simmer.

tandoori chicken.instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices, grill until charred and cooked.

idli.instructions: Soak and grind rice and dal, ferment overnight, steam into soft idlis.

dosa.instructions: Prepare batter like idli, spread thin on a hot pan, cook until crisp.

chole bhature.instructions: Cook chickpeas with spices, knead dough, deep fry bhature, and serve.

gulab jamun.instructions: Make dough, shape into balls, deep fry and soak in sugar syrup.

pav bhaji.instructions: Mash vegetables with spices, cook with butter, serve with toasted pav.

rajma chawal.instructions: Cook kidney beans in tomato gravy, serve with steamed rice.

butter naan.instructions: Knead dough, let rise, roll out, cook on tandoor, brush with butter.

rasgulla.instructions: Curdle milk, knead into soft balls, boil in sugar syrup until spongy.

malai kofta.instructions: Make paneer-potato balls, fry, prepare creamy tomato gravy, mix and serve.

kachori.instructions: Prepare dough, fill with spicy lentil mixture, deep fry until crisp.

sheer kurma.instructions: Boil milk, add vermicelli and nuts, cook until creamy.

jalebi.instructions: Prepare batter, fry in circular shapes, soak in sugar syrup.

gajar ka halwa.instructions: Grate carrots, cook in milk and ghee, add sugar, stir till thick.

shawarma.instructions: Grill chicken with spices, wrap in pita with garlic sauce and veggies.

tacos.instructions: Cook meat with spices, place in tortilla, top with cheese and veggies.

pho.instructions: Simmer broth with spices, cook noodles, add meat and fresh herbs.

lasagna.instructions: Layer pasta, meat sauce, and cheese, bake until golden and bubbly.

poutine.instructions: Cook fries, top with cheese curds, pour hot gravy over and serve.

falafel.instructions: Blend ingredients into a paste, shape into balls, deep fry until crispy.

ramen.instructions: Boil noodles, prepare broth, add toppings, serve hot.

churros.instructions: Make dough, pipe into hot oil, fry until golden, coat with sugar.

ceviche.instructions: Marinate raw fish in lime juice, mix with onions, herbs, and chili.

baklava.instructions: Layer phyllo dough with nuts and honey, bake until golden.

tiramisu.instructions: Dip ladyfingers in coffee, layer with mascarpone, top with cocoa.

bubble tea.instructions: Brew tea, add milk and sweetener, mix with cooked tapioca pearls.

pad thai.instructions: Stir-fry noodles with sauce, add protein, eggs, and top with peanuts.

corn dog.instructions: Dip hot dog in batter, deep fry until golden brown.

arepa.instructions: Mix cornmeal with water, form patties, cook on griddle, stuff with cheese.

samosa chaat.instructions: Break samosas, top with yogurt, chutney, chickpeas, and spices.

coffee.instructions: Brew coffee beans in hot water, add milk and sugar if desired, and serve hot.

juice.instructions: Blend fresh fruits with water, strain if needed, add sugar if desired, and serve chilled.

sushi.instructions: Roll sushi rice and fresh fish/vegetables in seaweed, slice into pieces, and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

kimchi.instructions: Ferment cabbage with spices and fish sauce, let it sit for a few days, and enjoy as a side dish.
